aircraft.value: Mantis Recon - AC-8772-466 at Training Center Beta

defect_observed.value: Emergency lighting system failure. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.

root_cause.value: Corrosion due to moisture accumulation in sealed compartment

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Battery Management component. Testing confirmed performance below acceptable limits.

corrective_action.value: Update software to latest certified version with bug fixes

preventive_action.value: Update technical documentation with lessons learned

remarks_investigation.value: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.

remarks_design.value: Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions. Date: 15/08/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Component inspection records verified. All quality parameters were within acceptable limits during manufacturing. Date: 18/08/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Fleet experience reviewed. Similar occurrences noted on other platforms. Support fleet-wide inspection. Date: 17/08/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality aspects from regulatory perspective reviewed. Investigation methodology is comprehensive and acceptable. Date: 19/08/2023 Signature: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Airworthiness implications assessed. Recommend issuance of technical directive for fleet-wide compliance. Date: 24/08/2023 Signature: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni

DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Mission Critical
b) Defect Observed: Emergency lighting system failure. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Corrosion due to moisture accumulation in sealed compartment
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Battery Management component. Testing
confirmed performance below acceptable limits.
c) Remedial Measures Update software to latest certified version with bug fixes

ii. Preventive Action: Update technical documentation with lessons learned
